title: Savage eSports Looking for Plat 3+ Top and Jungle
body:
Savage eSports are a newly formed organisation that are still seeking members to join our new roster (Top and Jungle).

What we are looking for: Active players that are willing to hang around for the long run, we do not plan on disbanding after 1 week like every other 'team'.

We currently have our own TeamSpeak 3 server up and running whilst we are still waiting for our website to be setup, We also have a youtube channel that has just been finalized.

Application template

IGN:
Age:
Rank:
Location:
Time Zone:
Day Light savings:
Position:
Champ pool:

Example;

IGN: Nestay
Age: 18
Rank: Plat
Location: Perth, Australia
Time Zone: GMT +8
Day Light savings: No
Position: Jungle
Champ pool: Kha, J4, Rammus, Elise etc.
